item.title: A poster advert board has been attached to the Lamp post, 5th July
item.description:
A poster advert board has been attached to the Lamp post between number 54-58 Imperial Way, for a paving business, no driveways have been carried out recently, so it is fly posting - Please remove from the lamp post
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Imperial Way, London

item.title: Trees on at the entry of Telegraph path near Green Lane need pruning, 5th July
item.description:
The trees on telegraph path are creating a lot of darkness on the path. They are also starting to come into the property and the overhanging branches are creating a risk of damage to the car parked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 131, Green Lane, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of household waste dumped on Clapton terrace, 5th July
item.description:
A load of household waste once again dumped on the terrace bin area. Some from renovations on the terrace some from those who don’t live here. Either way it is a persistant problem that needs council attention.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 5th July

item.title: Abandoned for a whole month, 5th July
item.description:
This car is potentially stolen as it was covered up but the wind blew the covers off. It has been in this position for over a month and has no MOT

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Floathaven Close, Thamesmead, London

item.title: Insecure premises, 5th July
item.description:
The Mind charity building had squatters in April & boarded up by enforcement officers. Today people have broken back into the property, damaged the doors and skylights, broke alarm robot in the courtyard. 999 was called at the time but unsure if attended.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tudor Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken footpath, 5th July
item.description:
Hi I have reported this before but no reply, this path needs urgent attention as it’s broken and can become a tip hazard being a health and safety issue. Please advise when this will be repaired Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, Faversham Avenue, Southbury, Enfield, London
Report on FixMyStreet
